original_text: There should be more marriages between your people and our people. Our men should marry your daughters and our daughters should become wives for your men.
korean_text: 너희가 우리와 통혼하여 너희 딸을 우리에게 주며 우리 딸을 너희가 데려가고

sentences.original_text: between your people and our people
Our men should marry your daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 우리의 남자들은 당신의 딸들과 결혼해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and our daughters should become wives
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리의 딸들은 아내가 되어야 합니다
